full_summary:
## Title
Isolated Cell Sprinkler Valves Replacement Y Unit I Range

## Request for Proposal - Document Reference:
## Document Identification: Solicitation Number
- Solicitation Number: 21421-24-4544843-1
- Reference Number: cb-791-50537738
- Amendment Number: 4

## Procurement Category
- Procurement Category: Contract No Service (CNST)

## Trade Agreements
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Notice Type and Method
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFQ)
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Contract Duration
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-01
- Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

## Requirements
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to replace isolated cell sprinkler valves in the lower I range cells (Y Unit) at Millhaven Institution. The scope of work includes:
- Installation of 12 individual isolation valves into the fire protection system.
- Electronic connection of valves to the site fire alarm system for remote monitoring.
- Verification of compatibility with the building's automation system.

## Requirements Summary
The contractor must:
- Ensure compliance with CSC technical standards.
- Notify Siemens for installation into their fire detection system.
- Perform all work within the specified timeframe.

## Conditions for Participation
- Suppliers must be registered in the Government of Canada's Merx or Buy and Sell system.
- Suppliers must confirm compliance with the PSIB if they are an Indigenous business.

## Preference
- Preference is given to Indigenous suppliers.

## Solicitation Document
Bidders can obtain the complete solicitation document by following the link:
[URL: Canada Buys / Tender Opportunities website]

## Contracting Authority
Emily Collins, Contracting Authority
Phone: (613) 329-1827
Email: [emily.collins@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:emily.collins@csc-scc.gc.ca)

## Contact Information
Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. Seminars are free.
Phone: (613) 291-3200
Email: [parget@buyandsell.gc.ca](mailto:parget@buyandsell.gc.ca)#
Website: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca)#
